main.name: Ethan Ackerman
main.description: Searching for opportunities in audio and music production, teaching and cartography
main.bio: I am a multi disciplined graduated from Macalester College Class in 2020 with a double major in Chinese and Geography. I have experience teaching and creating bilingual curriculums online and in person for students improving their English language skills.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in working together you can contact me below

resume.skillmessage: Maps and conducting geospatial analysis using ESRI and QGIS, sound engineer and online english teacher

education.description: Studied Human Geography combined with GIS to analyze complex geospatial problems such as food deserts, famines, public health and global supply chains.

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Virtual English teacher through Skype for Native Chinese speakers in Taiwan, China, Canada and the US taking the TOFEL and IELTS - usually IELTS 4 to IELTS 8. Designed dozens of bilingual lessons and syllabi.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Studied under a certified and professional Shiatsu masseuse. Administrative work and working hands on with clients with upper back and shoulder pain.

work.title: Rental Associate
work.description: Managed a 100+ boat rental operation. Gave tours to individuals, small groups and company events. 3 months.

work.title: Portland Waterway and Outreach Coordinator
work.description: Created online maps and web pages in ESRI. Educated boaters on docks of new rules on wakes on the Willamette river.

work.title: Cartography Fellow
work.description: Research on redistricting. Collaborated on GerryChain, a Geospatial Python library to analyze redistricting plans. github.com/mggg/GerryChain
